    Module dash.core.gameobject

    Defines the GameObject class, to be subclassed by scripts and instantiated for static objects.

    Classes

    Name Description
    GameObject Manages all components and transform in the world. Can be overridden.

    Structs

    Name Description
    ObjectStateFlags Contains flags for all things that could be disabled.

    Global variables

    Name Type Description
    AnonymousName string
